post.text: Today, I unveiled my 100-day plan -- a plan that will create jobs and a stronger economy, a plan with a solid strategy to finally defeat and end ISIS, a plan that paves the way for a greater America -- an America that WINS again. Believe me, as President I will do more in 100 days than Hillary could in a lifetime -- she's had 30 years and done NOTHING. #ImWithYou! #DrainTheSwamp

comment.author: Shawnte
comment.text: Trump is done... the speech was pathetic, he started off saying he was going to sue people? I thought this was a serious speech? I'm for Trump but sorry he's DONE!

replies.author: James
replies.text: He rolled out the most policy we've seen from CCC day 1. I agree some parts could have been omitted and saved for a normal rally, but his speach had substance.
